content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[employees]
(
   empId INT NOT NULL ,
   empName NVARCHAR(20),
   gender  NVARCHAR(20)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (empId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

INSERT INTO dbo.employees VALUES (1,'Vaibhav','Male');
INSERT INTO dbo.employees VALUES (2,'Shreyas','Male');
INSERT INTO dbo.employees VALUES (3,'Shambhuraje','Male');
INSERT


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--Create table using select statement
CREATE TABLE dbo.femaleEmp
WITH
(
DISTRIBUTION = HASH(empId),
CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
    SELECT * FROM dbo.employees
    WHERE gender = 'Female'

SELECT * FROM dbo.femaleEmp;

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Using INTO

SELECT *
INTO dbo.employeesNew
FROM dbo.employees;

SELECT * FROM dbo.employeesNew
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
